pluggable.name: SmugMug Media Silo
pluggable.author: Colin Seymour
pluggable.description: Provides a silo to access your SmugMug photos making it easy to include images into posts and pages, and also upload images directly to SmugMug from within Habari.

help.value: The SmugMug Media Silo plugin implements a Habari silo to access your SmugMug photos making it easy to include images into posts and pages and also upload images directly to SmugMug.
